About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm Joseph Adebayo Omisakin, A Professional Software Developer.

In-depth knowledge of computer programming languages with the ability to code and think creatively to find the unique solution to problems. Expert understanding of software and applications development Infrastructure, as well as mobile/web and cross-platform hybrid mobile applications development.

Interest in usability and accessible design, Information systems
And Evidence-based
Technology Management solutions.
~ Life long learner....

Software Developer

Full Stack Developer

I design super cool websites for easy customissation, front-end and back-end coding stuff and almost anything.

Providing end users with a digital content delivery platform for automation, simplicity, and brand awareness.

I enjoy learning new technology with the ability to provide end-to-end effort estimate for complete SaaS and PaaS projects.

Mobile Developer

Mobile web Applications programmer

Develop mobile applications for Android and IOS platform. Using Android studio and cross-platform mobile technologies.

Experience in designing custom plugins for native functionality for android camera and geolocation using Cordova. Ability to leverage Framework7 to design and implement UI elements for both Android and IOS platform.

In dept knowledge, developing and designing admin interface for server management using Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript jQuery & Ajax. Ability to write code for server and database connection and management using PHP, JSON to Parse data, MySQL and SQLite for data storage.

Project Management

Software and applications development infrastructure.

Requirements Gathering, Analysis and End-to-end Development. Ability to evaluate business requirements and information technology capabilities. Research and recommend solutions available for improving existing ERP applications and supporting applications. Experienced at creating product designs from wireframe, mockups for mobile apps and web-app prototype.

Running BETA and Pilot programs with early-stage products and samples. Maintaining and prioritizing team backlog and roadmap during production. Attention to details with the ability to receive business needs from management to solicit product and enhancement requirements from end users and convert the requests into a workable solution for continuous integration.
